privacy.metaDescription: CORIA app privacy policy. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your data.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.footer: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at privacy@coria.app.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content:
CORIA values your privacy and data security. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal data when you use the CORIA mobile app and website.

CORIA is a vegan lifestyle assistant that helps users make conscious consumption decisions by scanning product barcodes to provide vegan compatibility, allergen warnings, health, and sustainability scores.

This policy complies with Turkey's Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK) and the European Union General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content:
Data Controller: CORIA

  • Contact: privacy@coria.app
  • Website: https://getcoria.com

As the data controller under KVKK and GDPR, we are responsible for processing your personal data. Use the contact information above to exercise your rights or ask questions.

dataCollected.title: Data We Collect
dataCollected.content:
We collect the following categories of personal data when you use CORIA:

1. Account Information

  • Email address
  • Username
  • Profile photo (optional)
  • Authentication credentials (encrypted)

2. Usage Data

  • Scanned product barcodes
  • Product scanning history
  • Favorite products list
  • Allergen and dietary preferences (vegan, gluten-free, etc.)
  • AI chat history

3. Technical Data

  • Device information (model, operating system)
  • IP address
  • App usage metrics (analytics)
  • Error logs (crash logs)

4. Permission-Based Data

  • Camera: For barcode scanning (required)
  • Location: For regional product recommendations (optional)
  • Biometric: For secure login via fingerprint/face recognition (optional)
  • Gallery Access: To select product photos from gallery (optional)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content:
We use your personal data for the following purposes:

1. App Functionality

  • Barcode scanning and product recognition
  • AI-powered vegan analysis
  • Personalized product recommendations
  • Allergen warnings and dietary compliance checks

2. User Experience

  • Account management and authentication
  • Saving your preferences (allergens, language, region)
  • Storing scanning history and favorite products
  • Regional product recommendations (if location permission granted)

3. Security and Fraud Prevention

  • Account security (biometric authentication)
  • Unauthorized access detection
  • Spam and abuse prevention

4. Improvement and Analytics

  • App performance monitoring
  • Debugging and troubleshooting
  • User behavior analysis (anonymous)
  • New feature development

5. Communication

  • Important notifications (security, policy changes)
  • Premium subscription management
  • Customer support

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis
legalBasis.content:
We process your personal data under the following legal grounds:

1. Contract Performance (KVKK Art.5/2-c, GDPR Art.6/1-b)

  • Account creation and authentication
  • Barcode scanning and product analysis services
  • Premium subscription management

2. Legitimate Interest (KVKK Art.5/2-f, GDPR Art.6/1-f)

  • App security and fraud prevention
  • Service quality improvement
  • Anonymous analytics and usage metrics

3. Consent (KVKK Art.5/1, GDPR Art.6/1-a)

  • Location data collection (for regional recommendations)
  • Biometric authentication
  • Marketing communications (if any)

4. Legal Obligation (KVKK Art.5/2-a, GDPR Art.6/1-c)

  • Tax and accounting records (premium payments)
  • Response to legal requests and investigations

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services and Data Sharing
thirdParty.content:
CORIA shares data with the following third-party services to provide functionality:

1. Supabase (Authentication, Database, Storage)

  • Purpose: User authentication, data storage
  • Location: European Union (EU) servers
  • Data: Email, account info, app data
  • Privacy: https://supabase.com/privacy

2. OpenAI (GPT - AI Product Analysis)

  • Purpose: Product analysis and vegan evaluation
  • Location: United States
  • Data: Product information (anonymous, no user ID)
  • Privacy: https://openai.com/privacy
  • Note: Data sent to OpenAI is anonymous and contains no user identifiers

3. OpenFoodFacts (Product Database)

  • Purpose: Open-source product database access
  • Location: Global
  • Data: Barcode numbers (public database queries)
  • Privacy: https://world.openfoodfacts.org/privacy

4. Sentry (Error Monitoring)

  • Purpose: Error tracking and app stability
  • Location: United States
  • Data: Error logs, device info (no user ID)
  • Privacy: https://sentry.io/privacy

5. RevenueCat (In-App Purchases)

  • Purpose: Premium subscription management
  • Location: United States
  • Data: User ID, purchase history
  • Privacy: https://www.revenuecat.com/privacy

Data Transfer Safeguards:

  • All third-party services use GDPR-compliant Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC)
  • Data transfers outside the EU are made with adequate protection measures
  • Minimum necessary data is shared with third parties

dataRetention.title: Data Retention Periods
dataRetention.content:
We retain your personal data only as long as necessary:

1. Active User Accounts

  • Period: While account is active (until user deletes)
  • Scope: Account info, preferences, scanning history, favorites

2. Inactive User Accounts

  • Period: Automatic deletion after 2 years of inactivity
  • Notification: Email warning sent before deletion

3. Deleted Accounts

  • Period: 30-day temporary storage (for recovery), then permanent deletion
  • Note: Data cannot be recovered after 30 days

4. Analytics and Statistical Data

  • Period: 1 year (anonymous, aggregated)
  • Scope: Usage metrics, performance data

5. Error Logs (Crash Logs)

  • Period: 90 days
  • Scope: Technical error information, device data

6. Payment Records

  • Period: 10 years (legal requirements)
  • Scope: Invoice details, transaction records (via RevenueCat)

userRights.title: User Rights (GDPR & KVKK)
userRights.content:
Under KVKK and GDPR, you have the following rights:

1. Right to Information

  • Learn what personal data is being processed
  • Inquire about processing purposes
  • Find out who data is shared with

How to Use: App ‚Üí Profile ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí "View My Data"

2. Right to Rectification

  • Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
  • Update profile information

How to Use: App ‚Üí Profile ‚Üí "Edit Profile"

3. Right to Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten")

  • Permanently delete your account and all data
  • All personal data deleted within 30 days

How to Use: App ‚Üí Profile ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí "Delete Account"

4. Right to Data Portability

  • Receive your data in structured, common format (JSON)
  • Transfer your data to another service

How to Use: Email "Data Portability Request" to privacy@coria.app

5. Right to Object

  • Object to data processing based on legitimate interest
  • Opt out of direct marketing

How to Use: Email privacy@coria.app

6. Right to Object to Automated Decision-Making

  • Request manual review of AI analyses

Rights Exercise Process:

  • Requests answered within 30 days
  • May require identity verification
  • Free of charge (within reasonable request limits)

security.title: Security Measures
security.content:
CORIA implements industry-standard technical and administrative measures to protect your personal data:

1. Data Encryption

  • Communication: SSL/TLS encryption (HTTPS)
  • Storage: Database encryption (AES-256)
  • Passwords: Bcrypt hash algorithm (one-way)

2. Access Control

  • Row Level Security (RLS): User-based access in Supabase database
  • API Security: Token-based authentication (JWT)
  • Biometric Login: Device-based fingerprint/face recognition

3. Application Security

  • Secure code review and testing
  • Regular security updates
  • Dependency security scanning

4. Monitoring and Incident Response

  • Real-time security monitoring
  • Abnormal activity detection
  • Data breach response plan

5. Staff Training

  • Data protection training
  • Principle of least privilege
  • Confidentiality agreements

Note: No internet-based system is 100% secure. Keep your password strong and never share it.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content:
Users Under 13 Years Old

CORIA app is not intended for children under 13 and we do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13.

Parent/Guardian Notification:

  • If you become aware that a child under 13 is using our app, please immediately notify us at privacy@coria.app
  • Upon notification, the account and all personal data will be deleted within 7 days

Verification:

  • We perform age verification during account creation
  • Users under 13 are prevented from creating accounts

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content:
Since CORIA uses global services, your personal data may be transferred outside the European Economic Area (EEA):

1. Supabase (EU Servers)

  • Location: European Union (Frankfurt, Germany)
  • Protection: Full GDPR compliance, data within EU borders

2. OpenAI (USA)

  • Location: United States
  • Data: Only anonymous product information (no user ID)
  • Protection: Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC), GDPR-compliant

3. Sentry (USA)

  • Location: United States
  • Data: Anonymous error logs
  • Protection: Privacy Shield successor, SCC

4. RevenueCat (USA)

  • Location: United States
  • Data: User ID and purchase data
  • Protection: GDPR-compliant, SCC

Our Safeguards:

  • We use Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC) for data transfers outside the EU
  • Third-party services provide adequate protection under GDPR Article 46
  • Principle of minimum necessary data transfer
  • Regular compliance audits

changes.title: Privacy Policy Changes
changes.content:
CORIA may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We notify you of changes through:

1. Notification Methods

  • In-App: Pop-up notification for significant changes
  • Email: Notification to your registered email
  • Website: "Last Updated" date change

2. Significant Changes

  • New data collection categories
  • Expansion of data use purposes
  • New third-party integrations
  • Changes to user rights

These changes require 30-day advance notice and explicit consent.

3. Minor Changes

  • Contact information updates
  • Writing and clarity improvements
  • Legal reference updates

Only the "Last Updated" date is changed for these.

4. Consent Mechanism

  • Continued app use after significant changes constitutes explicit consent
  • You have the right to close your account if you do not consent
